mapper.sql: select 'worker' as entity_name, wa_uh.* from ((select a.id*3 as id, a.entity_attribute_id, a.text, a.number, a.date, a.start_date, a.user_id from worker_attribute a left join worker d on a.domain_id = d.id where d.object_id = #{map.objectId}) union all (select id*5 as id, 1000, concat_ws(' ', IF(uh.login is not null, concat('login: ', uh.login), ''), IF(uh.password is not null, concat(' password_hash: ', substr(uh.password, 1, 8)), ''), IF(uh.group is not null, concat(' group: ', uh.group), '')), null, null, uh.date as start_date, uh.worker_id as user_id from user_history uh where uh.user_id = #{map.userId})) wa_uh order by wa_uh.start_date desc
